label: 五代友厚
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
説明文: (1836-85). Satsuma samurai (apparently hirazamurai). Studied naval science under Dutch at Nagasaki, becoming Satsuma naval and shipping expert. Advocate of fukoku-kyohei. Misson to Europe with Terajima Munenori, 1865-66. Councillor (Sanyo) in early Meiji government. Later entrepreneur, with interests in transport, mining, and textiles.
